subject: WKRPT
title: Science Work-Term Report 2
description: Students submit a detailed work-term report based on a technical project, activity or analysis they conducted during their work term. Work-term reports are required courses for the co-op designation. Submitted grades are not included in any averages. Detailed guidelines for work-term reports are posted on the Faculty website. [Note: PD 11 counts as work-term report 1]
